MENUMENU
  • Products

        • Why Forbes?

          There are variety of reasons to include hedge funds in a portfolio of otherwise traditional investments. The most cited reason to include them in any portfolio is their ability to reduce risk and add diversification. We have mentioned before how many hedge funds claim absolute return mandates whereby returns are minimally correlated with equity market. In such case, hedge funds serve as a great means to diversify, particularly in times of increased market volatility and/or an outright bear market.

OUTCOME-FOCUSED ALTERNATIVE INVESTMENT STRATEGIES

Research Driven

Benefit from the specialist knowledge and global reach of our independent alternative investment teams.

Actionable Insights

Invest with conviction by capitalising on our expert and actionable insights into the alternatives asset class.

Outcome Oriented

Choose from a broad range of compelling alternative investment solutions—custom-made to help you meet your specific objectives.

Demonstrated Results

Draw on the strength of the world’s third-largest alternative asset manager—and the largest alternative asset manager for pension fund assets—backed by a track record of over 40 years.

Premium Plans

Experienced investors in the Capital markets understand larger investments yield more reproducible returns by our QUANTS due to large trade volumes available

forbes-premium-plans (1)

DOWNLOAD PDF

Diversified portfolios for different kinds of investors.

With decades of managerial experience at our disposal, we offer investors a wide investment latitude with the choice of numerous sectors where funds can be actively invested. Returns are collated and filed at the end of every 30-day cycle with management fees averaging 12-14% profit

Committed to advice that's right for you.

We don’t get paid to sell certain funds and we don’t have funds of our own, so our priorities are simple. And if you ever have questions or want to talk through your financial situation, our team of financial experts is on hand.

  • Our team of Experts

Getting into the details

How pricing works

Our Digital plan, which is a fit for most customers, has an annual fee of 0.25% per year on your balance—or about $25 per year for every $10,000 invested. There’s no minimum balance on your account, ever.

For more in-depth advice on higher balances, we offer a Premium plan for an annual fee of 0.40%. Select the plan that works for you.

How our investments work
 

We manage your money and invest it in a recommended portfolio when you deposit. We handle the trading and rebalancing for you.

Help with your account or finances
 

Our customer support team is available seven days a week to answer questions about your account.

If you want in-depth financial advice, you can talk to a certified advisor by phone. Our Premium plan provides you with unlimited access and costs 0.40% per year on your invested balances.

We also offer advice packages for needs of all kinds, starting at $199.

Satisfaction guaranteed
 
We’re committed to providing you with a great financial experience. If you’re not completely satisfied, we’ll do everything we can to make it right.

Your financial life, unified.

With decades of managerial experience at our disposal, we offer investors a wide investment latitude with the choice of numerous sectors where funds can be actively invested. Returns are collated and filed at the end of every 30-day cycle with management fees averaging 12-14% profit

A smarter way to think about taxes.

Our technology automates tax-saving strategies like asset location and tax loss harvesting that work to help make the most of your investments behind the scenes.

Whatever you want to save for, we can help you get there.

Forbes Capital is a leading investment provider to financial market professionals. Our technical strategies cover Bitcoin, equity, commodities and fixed-income markets. Our market depth and knowledge are attributed to our acquired experience on trading floors of many banking institutions. Forbes Capital is duely registered with the British Standard Institution (BSI), with registration number FM 12249 Download PDF.

Risk Warning

The financial products offered via this website include digitals, contracts for difference (CFDs), and other complex derivatives and financial products. Trading options may not be suitable for everyone. Trading CFDs carries a high level of risk without proper leverage and can work to your disadvantage. As a result, the products offered on this website is suitable for all investors because of the little risk of losing your invested capital. You should never try to invest money on your own that you cannot afford to lose, and never trade yourself with borrowed money, we are in it for you. Before trading in the complex financial products offered, please be sure to understand the risks involved and learn about Secure and responsible trading.
